title: New: Arkon Fly – Back Seat
content:
Following up on their infectious debut single, London duo Arkon Fly return with Back Seat, another glisteningly perfect slice of soulful inspired dance music.

A funky hybrid between the likes of Disclosure and recent break through success Jungle, mixed with a sexier vibe, more akin with someone like Justin Timberlake, and if that’s not a compliment, then I don’t know what is. Check out Back Seat below, and keep up with Arkon Fly via Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
